DataElement.preferredName: Body Surface Area Lower Extremity Assessment Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical percentage value of the BSA assessment for the lower extremity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Body Surface Area Lower Extremity Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measure of the 2-dimensional extent of the body surface (i.e., the skin).  Body surface area (BSA) can be calculated by mathematical formula or from a chart that relates height to weight.  BSA is often an important factor in dosing.:The limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measure of the 2-dimensional extent of the body surface (i.e., the skin).  Body surface area (BSA) can be calculated by mathematical formula or from a chart that relates height to weight.  BSA is often an important factor in dosing.
